externalTrafficPolicy.description: external traffic policy (can be specified when service type is LoadBalancer or NodePort) : Cluster or Local

kind.description: deployment kind: Deployment, DaemonSet or StatefulSet

format.description: logging format. logging format must be `raw` or `json`

level.description: logging level. logging level must be `debug`, `info`, `warn`, `error` or `fatal`.

logger.description: logger name. currently logger must be `glg` or `zap`.

maxReplicas.description: maximum number of replicas. if HPA is disabled, this value will be ignored.

minReplicas.description: minimum number of replicas. if HPA is disabled, the replicas will be set to this value

auto_create_index_pool_size.description: batch process pool size of automatic create index operation

auto_index_length.description: number of cache to trigger automatic indexing

default_pool_size.description: default create index batch pool size

distance_type.description: distance type. it should be `l1`, `l2`, `angle`, `hamming`, `cosine`,`poincare`, `lorentz`, `jaccard`, `sparsejaccard`, `normalizedangle` or `normalizedcosine`. for further details about NGT libraries supported distance is https://github.com/yahoojapan/NGT/wiki/Command-Quick-Reference and vald agent's supported NGT distance type is https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/vdaas/vald/internal/core/algorithm/ngt#pkg-constants

enable_copy_on_write.description: enable copy on write saving for more stable backup

enable_proactive_gc.description: enable proactive GC call for reducing heap memory allocation

load_index_timeout_factor.description: a factor of load index timeout. timeout duration will be calculated by (index count to be loaded) * (factor).

max_load_index_timeout.description: maximum duration of load index timeout

min_load_index_timeout.description: minimum duration of load index timeout

object_type.description: object type. it should be `float` or `uint8` or `float16`. for further details: https://github.com/yahoojapan/NGT/wiki/Command-Quick-Reference

version_info_labels.description: enabled label names of version info

enabled.description: enables PVC. It is required to enable if agent pod's file store functionality is enabled with non in-memory mode

storageClass.description: storageClass name for agent pod volume

podManagementPolicy.description: pod management policy: OrderedReady or Parallel

revisionHistoryLimit.description: number of old history to retain to allow rollback

serviceType.description: service type: ClusterIP, LoadBalancer or NodePort

auto_backup_enabled.description: auto backup triggered by timer is enabled

write_buffer_size.description: bytes of the chunks for upload

write_content_encoding.description: the encoding of the blob's content

enable_100_continue.description: enable AWS SDK adding the 'Expect: 100-Continue' header to PUT requests over 2MB of content.

enable_content_md5_validation.description: enable the S3 client to add MD5 checksum to upload API calls.

enable_endpoint_host_prefix.description: enable prefixing request endpoint hosts with modeled information

max_part_size.description: s3 multipart upload max part size

max_retries.description: maximum number of retries of s3 client

use_arn_region.description: s3 service client to use the region specified in the ARN

dual_stack_enabled.description: gRPC client TCP dialer dual stack enabled

keepalive.description: gRPC client TCP dialer keep alive

cache_enabled.description: gRPC client TCP DNS cache enabled

cache_expiration.description: gRPC client TCP DNS cache expiration

refresh_duration.description: gRPC client TCP DNS cache refresh duration

ip_recover_destination_addr.description: server listen socket option for ip_recover_destination_addr functionality

ip_transparent.description: server listen socket option for ip_transparent functionality

reuse_port.description: server listen socket option for reuse_port functionality

tcp_no_delay.description: server listen socket option for tcp_no_delay functionality

tcp_quick_ack.description: server listen socket option for tcp_quick_ack functionality

max_conns_per_host.description: maximum count of connections per host

max_idle_conns_per_host.description: maximum count of idle connections per host

compression_level.description: compression level. value range relies on which algorithm is used. `gob`: level will be ignored. `gzip`: -1 (default compression), 0 (no compression), or 1 (best speed) to 9 (best compression). `lz4`: >= 0, higher is better compression. `zstd`: 1 (fastest) to 22 (best), however implementation relies on klauspost/compress.

post_stop_timeout.description: timeout for observing file changes during post stop

watch_enabled.description: auto backup triggered by file changes is enabled

format.description: logging format. logging format must be `raw` or `json`

level.description: logging level. logging level must be `debug`, `info`, `warn`, `error` or `fatal`.

logger.description: logger name. currently logger must be `glg` or `zap`.

version_info_labels.description: enabled label names of version info
